TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ProfileServiceManager extends System.Object

summary.span: 配置一组预加载的配置文件属性和配置文件服务的自定义实现的位置。

span.span: Configures a set of preloaded profile properties and the location of a custom implementation of the profile service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类对应于属性，可以添加到或控件。The class corresponds to the property that can be added to the or control. 你可以使用指定一组呈现和将可供客户端脚本的页时将预加载的配置文件属性。You can use to specify a set of profile properties that will be preloaded when the page is rendered and will be available to client script. 此外，而不是使用内置的配置文件的 ASP.NET AJAX 功能提供的 Web 服务，你可以使用此类提供将用于加载或从脚本中保存配置文件属性的 Web 服务的其他实现的路径。Also, instead of using the built-in profile Web service provided by AJAX features of ASP.NET, you can use this class to provide the path of an alternative implementation of the Web service that will be used for loading or saving profile properties from script. 若要在你的应用程序中使用配置文件服务，必须在配置文件中启用它。To use the profile service in your application, you must enable it in the configuration file. 如果你使用 Web 服务的内置配置文件，并不需要预加载属性，你无需在页面上显式声明该配置文件服务管理器。If you use the built-in profile Web service and do not have to preload properties, you do not have to explicitly declare the profile service manager on the page. 若要以声明方式指定一组预加载的属性或自定义配置文件 Web 服务，包括``内的元素``元素在页面上，如下面的示例中所示。To declaratively specify a set of preloaded properties, or a custom profile Web service, include a `` element inside the `` element on the page, as shown in the following example. ``` ``` 你可以以编程方式配置配置文件服务为预加载属性，或者使用 Web 服务的自定义配置文件。You can also programmatically configure the profile service to preload properties or to use a custom profile Web service. 下面的示例演示必须在 Web 服务的自定义配置文件中实现的基本类结构。The following example shows the basic class structure that must be implemented in a custom profile Web service.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property cli::array <System::String ^> ^ LoadProperties { cli::array <System::String ^> ^ get(); void set(cli::array <System::String ^> ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个数组，其中包含可用于客户端脚本的配置文件属性。

span.span: Gets or sets an array that contains the profile properties that will be made available to client script.

value.span: 一个字符串数组，其中包含将预加载并将提供给客户端脚本使用的配置文件属性的名称。

span.span: A string array that contains the names of the profile properties that will be preloaded and made available to client script.
The default is an empty array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果包含至少一个字符串，它对应于配置文件属性的名称，然后在 Web 应用程序中内置的配置文件服务为每个指定的配置文件属性检索当前用户的配置文件数据。If contains at least one string that corresponds to the name of a profile property, then the built-in profile service in the Web application retrieves the current user's profile data for each of the specified profile properties. 配置文件属性值被序列化，然后，可用于为通过客户端脚本[属性字段](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ebce3c40-7017-482b-94df-91f7448fda05)集合。The profile property values are serialized and then made available to client script through the [properties Field](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ebce3c40-7017-482b-94df-91f7448fda05) collection. > [!NOTE] > 若要以声明方式设置此属性，请使用逗号分隔的属性名称列表。To set this property declaratively, use a comma-separated list of property names. 对于分组的属性值，使用以下语法*GroupName*。*PropertyName*。For grouped property values, use the syntax *GroupName*.*PropertyName*. 当为空数组，数据已预加载没有配置文件。When is an empty array, no profile data is preloaded. 属性可以指定在控件或关联控件。The property can be specified in the control or in an associated control. 当上都设置控件和上一个或多个通过将合并所有指定的属性来确定控件的属性集。When is set on both the control and on one or more controls, the set of properties is determined by merging all the specified properties. 重复的属性会被忽略。Duplicate properties are ignored.

exception.span: 属性包含当前应用程序的配置文件架构中不存在的属性名。

span.span: The property includes property names that are not in the current application’s profile schema.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Path { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置配置文件 Web 服务的自定义实现的路径。

span.span: Gets or sets the path of a custom implementation of the profile Web service.

value.span: 配置文件 Web 服务的自定义实现的路径。

span.span: The path of a custom implementation of the profile Web service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 允许相对虚拟路径、 绝对虚拟路径和完全限定路径。Relative virtual paths, absolute virtual paths, and fully-qualified paths are allowed. 如果未设置属性，则返回值为。If the property is not set, the return value is . 在这种情况下，ASP.NET AJAX 功能然后将使用内置的配置文件的以下内部默认路径相对应的 Web 服务: ~ / ScriptServices_ProfileService.asmx。In this case, the AJAX features of ASP.NET will then use the built-in profile Web service that corresponds to the following internal default path: ~/ScriptServices_ProfileService.asmx. 如果你设置，则会发生相同的行为是空值或`null`。The same behavior occurs if you set to be an empty value or `null`. 可以指定在控件或关联控件。 can be specified in the control or in an associated control. 当设置为级别，请注意以下事项：When is set at the level, the following caveats apply: - 如果控件层次结构中有多个代理不必在每个代理实例上设置。If there are multiple proxies in the control hierarchy, does not have to be set on each proxy instance. - 如果显式设置代理实例上，值必须显式设置此属性的所有其他代理的相同。If is explicitly set on a proxy instance, the value must be the same for all other proxies on which this property is explicitly set.

exception.span: 在控件层次结构中设置了多个唯一路径。

span.span: More than one unique path was set in the control hierarchy.
